What it is: Surfaces unconscious vows made in moments of pain or intensity.
How to use it: Describe patterns of avoidance or rigidity. Ask AI if they stem from symbolic vows you may have made (e.g. 'never again').
What it changes: Releases outdated contracts made under duress.

What it is: Rebuilds your internal authority figure from projection to presence.
How to use it: Describe how you judge yourself. Ask AI to reframe that authority into a wise internal guide.

What it is: Identifies where strength is actually a cover for woundedness.
How to use it: Describe an area of pride or perfectionism. Ask AI if it’s hiding a symbolic wound.
What it changes: Reveals what needs healing beneath competence.

What it is: Audits where you’re over-giving or under-receiving symbolically or emotionally.
How to use it: List your core relationships. Ask AI to calculate energetic imbalances and suggest corrective actions.

What it is: Simulates what principles or people exert the most gravitational pull on your psyche.
How to use it: Describe your decision-making tendencies. Ask AI what ‘massive bodies’ your orbit bends around.

What it is: Generates future visions in mythic rather than practical language.
How to use it: Ask AI to describe your future as if it were a mythic legend.

What it is: Finds where you mentally live in past or future to avoid the present.
How to use it: Describe your thought patterns. Ask AI what temporal distortions you engage in and how to re-anchor.

What it is: Distinguishes your authentic voice from internalized voices of parents, peers, or culture.
How to use it: Write a self-judgment. Ask AI who that voice belongs to and rewrite it in your own terms.

What it is: Stages your identity evolution in symbolic countdown form.
How to use it: Describe a life transition. Ask AI to count down 5 stages to a new self-symbolically (e.g., 5 ashes, 4 cracks…).
What it changes: Makes identity change trackable and poetic.

What it is: Translates your current emotional state into symbolic weather patterns.
How to use it: Describe your mood. Ask AI to return a weather forecast-style metaphorical report.
What it changes: Names feelings in digestible symbolic form.
